description:
Shouma`s brother. Unlike his brother, he has lots of romance experience and knows how to handle girls. He cares more than anyone else for his little sister Himari.
It is later revealed that he is not actually related to his siblings, but was adopted by the Takakura family after his http://anidb.net/ch38209 [real father] had died. His real sister is http://anidb.net/ch35027 [Natsume Masako].
He can see and converse with the ghost of the deceased http://anidb.net/ch35166 [Takakura Kenzan] and http://anidb.net/ch36571 [Watase Sanetoshi].
name: Takakura Kanba
